SamPy.log.Logger.setUpLogger¶

SamPy.log.Logger.setUpLogger(log_filename, loggername='logger')¶

Sets up a logger.

Param :log_filename: name of the file to save the log.
Param :loggername: name of the logger
Returns:logger instance
